name: Hey Arnold and the Quest for the Lost Baseball Cards
name_original: Hey Arnold and the Quest for the Lost Baseball Cards
description:
Arnold wants to show Gerald his signed Mickey Kaline baseball card when he discovers all of his cards are lost in the attic! Can you help him find all of his baseball cards, and save the day?

Controls: 

  • Up/Down/Left/Right - Move Arnold
  • Enter - Pause

Hints: 

  • After stepping off a wooden platform, it will break
  • After stepping off a two-way platform, it will rotate
  • If you're stuck, use the pause menu to reset the level
